findings.title: Centralization Risk
findings.description: Active contract ownership identified with elevated risk of centralization hacks, rug pull scams, and asset loss.

findings.title: Non-whitelisted wallet can only transfer a specified number of tokens
findings.description: A non-whitelisted wallet has a limitation on the number of tokens it can transfer.

findings.title: Non-whitelisted wallet can only hold a specified number of tokens
findings.description: A non-whitelisted wallet has a limitation on the number of tokens it can hold.

findings.title: Centralization Risk: Unremoved Authorization
findings.description: Smart contract owner can authorize a wallet to modify 'write contract' parameters. When ownership is transferred, previous owner should not remain authorized.
